name: Skquirm!
description: Whenever there is a problem or a dispute within a colony of bugs, the opposing parties consult the great King Roach. Under the king's orders, all disputes are settled by torrential combat in the holy arena named Toileseum. Skquirm! is a third-person multiplayer "kart" battle game where players take control of a cockroach riding a soap bottle. Collect, combine and use items to beat other players and win the battle!
